effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
short_effect.platinum: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.
flavor_text.platinum: If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.
